import React, {Component} from "react";


class Inputs extends Component{
    render(){
        return(
            <>
             <main>
            <form className="form">
                <input 
                    type="text"
                    placeholder="Top text"
                    className="form--input"
                />
                <input 
                    type="text"
                    placeholder="Bottom text"
                    className="form--input"
                />
                <button 
                    className="form--button"
                >
                    Get a new meme image ðŸ–¼
                </button>
            </form>
        </main>
            </>
        )
    }
}

export default Inputs
